Marketing the Experience

Marketing the Experience is a comprehensive unit designed to develop an understanding of why experience matters. This unit will equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to create and market memorable customer experiences in the fluid experience economy. In today's competitive business landscape, companies are increasingly focused on providing experiential marketing to create memorable and immersive brand and event experiences for customers. This course explores the strategies, tactics, and tools essential for crafting and promoting immersive and meaningful experiences that resonate with target audiences. A combination of theory, case studies, hands-on projects, and practical exercises, will allow you to gain a deep understanding of the principles and practices of experiential marketing.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand the concept of experiential marketing and the importance of the experience economy.

+  To analyse and critically evaluate successful experiential marketing campaigns

+  Develop a customer-centric mindset and apply this to an integrated marketing communication plan.

+  To develop practical skills by creating, planning, and designing an experiential marketing campaign using academic research and through exploration of real-life case studies
